text:
Santuario (formerly XML Security) does not appear at all on the Bugzilla home page.

It appears on the index page [1] as:
Security:     XML Security Project

It would be helpful if at least the text could be changed to include the new name, e.g.
Security:     Santuario (previously XML Security Project)

I raised this as a JIRA [2] but was told that this needs to be decided by the PMC.

[1] https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/enter_bug.cgi
[2] https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/INFRA-3003
creator: sebb@apache.org
coheigea@apache.org
text:
I commented on this on the JIRA...just to replicate what I said here:

As part of the push to finalize Santuario as a TLP we (the PMC) decided to move to use JIRA instead of bugzilla. Could you advise on whether it is possible to automate this process, or whether we will have to transfer issues manually?

For the moment, I suggest changing the text to what Sebb suggested, i.e.:

Security: Santuario (previously XML Security Project)

I don't see the point in changing the project name when we are going to migrate off bugzilla soon anyway.

Thanks,

Colm.

creator: coheigea@apache.org
text:
The INFRA team have updated the bugzilla description as per your suggestion. The website now also links to the correct product under "issue tracking":

https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/buglist.cgi?product=Security

Please verify and close this item.

Thanks,

Colm.
